scripts.prepublishOnly: npm version patch && npm install --no-save @babel/cli @babel/core @babel/preset-env @babel/plugin-proposal-class-properties @babel/preset-react && babel src -d transpiled --copy-files --plugins=@babel/plugin-proposal-class-properties --presets=@babel/preset-env,@babel/preset-react
scripts.clean: wsl rm -rfd ./node_modules && wsl rm -rfd ./transpiled && wsl rm ./package-lock.json
